com.facebook.litho

Class EventHandlersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.EventHandlersController

  • public class EventHandlersController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the mapping of event handlers to dispatchers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EventHandlersController.EventHandlersWrapper
      Used to hold a dispatcher's event handlers.
